author: ja vy
comment: Why you don't catch system "Do not disturb" status? Why I have to use both Wear and Health apps, one for the notifications, alarm (same, why don't collab with others, you are worse in it) and other for sleep data? Please, do something before I lose my band 2 pro, locks aren't good also :(
Please give us a good update!  When I'm asleep, the heart rate light is on continuously. It doesn't switch off until it detects I'm awake again. Its killing my battery. This only happens at night.

author: David Rychlý
comment: Doesn't fully paired my Huawei Band 2 Pro with Huawei Health app on my phone (P9 Lite). Sleep tracking and automatic tracking doesn't work as well. Quite useless, it would be a lot better if we could pair the band's with phone directly and not with this broken app. Now not only pair with Health app not working but I can't for example use my band for Smart unlock, because it can't be paired as Bluetooth device properly (not possible to find it by other way than this app).

author: Jakub Ciemny
comment: I'd love it if app would let me change the ui language of my honor band 3. Now it's the same as the apps. The app takes the language from system. Since the band doesn't support my language, when i have my phone in Polish, the band is in chinese. So i have to have my phone's os in english. If i could either change in-app language or language of my band, that would be great!

author: Jose Mendoza
comment: This app causes a huge battery drain on my phone. I'm talking down to 20% in 6-8hrs, and that's if I don't use the phone at all. Unfortunately you need this app if you plan on using the Huawei Health app, since its the only way the app captures sleep/heart rate data. If you don't plan on using that, then don't bother installing this.

author: Mika Ruotsalainen
comment: honor band 3, i wish there would be option to keep watch screen on all the time. also it would be nice to customize what would be on main screen.. like hr and how many messages. Bluetooth logo examble is waste of space.

author: Phil Wheeler
comment: Doesn't integrate with Strava or most other popular services. Unable to export the data either, so very much a lock-in experience.

author: bharath gupta
comment: I was expecting this official app to have options like 'Camera' in smart watch.. But interestingly not. :( All the options we have in this app appears to be redundant as Google fit is already doing most and it comes by default..

author: Tuan Muhammad Gadaffi Tuan Rosdan
comment: Developer not answering my question even yet. Even I already email to them. What a waste !

author: Lampros Mousselimis
comment: I can't understand how my huawei p8 lite cannot pair with huawei color band a2......  You need to try hard to succeed such an epic FAIL  Huawei engineering is the worst....  Just release a fix ASAP

author: Pradip P
comment: This is a good app to sync with my Huawei Band 2 Pro, but we need the Huawei Health app as well to check our daily workout logs. Both functions need to be integrated into a single app. The software needs more options like turn off auto-wakeup on twist at night. This is irritating as the screen wakes up and puts light on my face thus waking me up. Also the phone message notification cannot be dismissed without going through the entire message.

author: Cenk Cs
comment: My wristband not connects itself when I get close to my phone.When I press connect in the app still not connecting most of the time.I should close my background apps and open the app again.Honor Band 3 btw

author: Ian McGuire
comment: What has happened to sleep tracking? Just constantly searches for data from my band? Have you broken it?
bad. Using redmi note 3 pro, was using miband 2. Try for huawei a2, after a FORCED firmware update, now the notifications not working anymore

author: Chakravarthi b.n
comment: gave up MI band a much better app and wear than this and now 😥😪 Where is sleep tracking... doesn't work with out Bluetooth on 24/7

author: ankush sharma
comment: There is only one bug and that is still not fixed. When ever we trying to connect smart band it requires GPS to be on. Otherwise it's not able to connect with Bluetooth.

author: Prudhvi Sai Teja Reddy Bhoomi Reddy
comment: Data is not syncing properly after the last firmware update to the Huawei band 3. Sleep data is not available although I enabled it.

author: Toubia Ziad
comment: Very empty app the zen app has more stuff to support the watch, no watch faces no forgot my phone feature nithing empty.

author: shubhadeepta behera
comment: My band is getting disconnected automatically after the latest update..n also don't connect automatically..plz provide the prev version.

author: Anubhav Narayan singh
comment: Step counting very inaccurate, while traveling in car it counts as a step. Need to improve the calibration of step counting

author: Jonathan Hostiadi
comment: Please update so i dont need to turn on the location to pair my honor band and fix the connection (sometimes disconnect for no reason and the auto pair after disconnect)

author: Gurjashan Jot Singh
comment: Please add the ability to switch off the band's bluetooth when disconnected from phone tosave battery life. Rest is good

author: ravi shankar N.S
comment: Notification section not responding.. Can't select which all need to notify me.. If click on notification.. App will close on it own.. My device is yu yureka.. Fix this issue

author: Rajesh Ramesh
comment: Make some UI changes and good watch integration and provide firmware update for band a2

author: Abhishek Pratap Singh
comment: Last update ruined the purpose. No auto sync with Huawei health app. Also manually syncing is a disaster since true sleep data does not sync. Please provide an update.

author: max doodle
comment: Why do I need this all out just tells me some of the info from Huawei health and tells me to go to that app for more health info. Useless!

author: Bhavin Panchal
comment: I am using this app with my honor band 3. It shows all data perfectly....only issue with it's calories burn unit... It shows calories burn data in kcals... Say 400kcal...which is actually 400cals...please fix it... Have concern when link this data woth any fitness app.

author: AMIT RANJAN
comment: App can't count climbing of stairs etc. Lags phone. Fixing required.

author: qairul izwan
comment: Im wearing on right hand 🖐️. I see on youtube, there is a wearing preference for old version, why i cant see it on this versio ?

author: Sokol M
comment: It is Not full sync with my Huawei band 2 pro. I can't see heart rate and sleeping monitors in Huawei health. Fix ASAP!
Not good Does not sync data with google fit myfitnesspal or samsung health. Recodrs low calleries.

author: Muhammad Maktum
comment: Update this application.Band A2  don't have 12 hour and weather information display and remote camera shutter. Please update this software for next version.

When I connect to IOS the time shown is in 12 hour format, however when I paired with Nova 2i, the time shown is in 24 hour format. Pls add in 12 hour format and the language setting! I prefer in Mandarin yet it appears in English!

author: kevin pallan
comment: Bug fix huh...!!! It's nt even pairing. Does it have older version or update the new version or pairing to all phone plsssssssss

author: Emdad Munna
comment: My huawei band a2 not pairing with my huawei y6ii prime handset. But it works with other similar bluetooth version hanset I.e. samsung galaxy grand prime. I need a solution. I like this gadget but can't use it.

author: Al Rabbi
comment: plz add the time change formate on colour band A 2

author: kiran shringi
comment: please include camera remote and music control and in fitness please include cycling

author: Balasubramanian N
comment: Not in sync with my phone. Don't know the problem.

author: Martynas Pukinskas
comment: Using Huawei Mate 10 Pro and Huawei Watch 2, doesn't sync with Huawei Health app. The Health app doesn't even find the Watch. Premium chinese sh***. Like always.

author: Hasan Mahmud
comment: herat rate not synchronising with huawe nova 2I.can anybody from the aadmin help on this
